casebody.data:
Gaylord SALTERS
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 21, 2017

Arthur L. Ledford, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Rita M. Shair, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Gaylord Salters' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn. App. 807, 170 A.3d 25 (2017), is denied.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
